title: Dogs with the most Instagram followers worldwide 2017
summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Number of followers in millions in the y axis.
The Number of followers in millions is appeared to be the highest at Month Jiff Pom @Jiffpom and lowest at Month Manny @manny the frenchie.
There is a difference of 5.6 between the maximum Month Jiff Pom @Jiffpom and minimum Month Manny @manny the frenchie.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of followers in millions for 10 number of Months.
The Number of followers in millions is highest at Month Jiff Pom @Jiffpom and lowest at Month Manny @manny the frenchie.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Number of followers in millions in the y axis.

max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Number of followers in millions in the y axis.
The Number of followers in millions is highest at Month Jiff Pom @Jiffpom and lowest at Month Manny @manny the frenchie.
Month  has the second highest value for Number of followers in millions.
The difference of Number of followers in millions between the highest and lowest Month is 5.6.
Month Jiff Pom @Jiffpom is higher than any other Months with value 6.6, followed by , and Maruto @Marutaro. Down to Month Manny @manny the frenchie with the lowest value 1.0.
Overall Number of followers in millions has decreased over the Months.
Month Manny @manny the frenchie, and Loki and Bear @Lokistagram share the same value 1.0.
The lowest value 1.0 at Manny @manny the frenchie is almost 2.95 times smaller than the average value 2.24.
Summing up the values of all Months, we get total 22.4.
